alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 3:02PM MDT until June 17 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OTERO...SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA AND CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 302 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Forder to near Sugar City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Ordway, Sugar City and Cheraw. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
